name: Discordus Sample
description: Disqus monitor and notification sender to Discord

DISCORDUS_DISQUS_FORUM.description: Disqus forum(s) to check, specified by shortname, comma separated.

DISCORDUS_DISCORD_WEBHOOK.description: URL of your Incoming WebHook in Discord. Can enter multiple comma seperated.

DISCORDUS_INTERVAL.description: Number of seconds between each check (default 60).

DISCORDUS_DISQUS_LIMIT.description: The number of recent comments to check (default 25, max 100).
